original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 18.22. Mahantaraduka, Hetuduka
analyzed: mahantaraduka hetuduka

original: Sārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sa ārammaṇam hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Sārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sa ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na anārammaṇaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Anārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: anārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na anārammaṇaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Sārammaṇaṁ nahetuñca anārammaṇaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu
analyzed: sa ārammaṇam na hetum ca anārammaṇam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na anārammaṇaḥ na na hetu

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā

original: ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ekam pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nocittaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocitto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: no cittam hetum dhammam paṭicca na no cittaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: cittam na hetum dhammam paṭicca no cittaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cetasikaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: cetasikam hetum dhammam paṭicca na cetasikaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cetasikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naacetasiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: cetasikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na acetasikaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sampayuttam hetum dhammam paṭicca na citta sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭham hetum dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam hetum dhammam paṭicca no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasahabhuṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sahabhum hetum dhammam paṭicca no citta sahabhū na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittānuparivattiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta anuparivattim hetum dhammam paṭicca no citta anuparivattī na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānam hetum dhammam paṭicca no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum hetum dhammam paṭicca no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim hetum dhammam paṭicca no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Bāhiraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabāhiro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: bāhiram hetum dhammam paṭicca na bāhiraḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Ajjhattikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ajjhattikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noupādā hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoupādā nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: no upādā hetum dhammam paṭicca na no upādā na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Upādā nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: upādā na hetum dhammam paṭicca no upādā na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā ekam pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Upādinnaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: upādinnam hetum dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Anupādinnaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: anupādinnam hetum dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane
analyzed: eka saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe āsevane

original: ekaṁ …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: ekam pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cattāri

original: Upādinnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: upādinnam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na anupādinnaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Anupādinnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: anupādinnam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ
analyzed: eka saṅkhitta hetuyā dve ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe āsevane eka

original: …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
